title: EMP Survival: :How to Prepare Now and Survive, When an Electromagnetic Pulse Destroys Our Power Grid
description: Military strategists in four countries have boasted that they can cripple the U.S. with an EMP attack. Other countries have protected their power grids from an EMP attack. The U.S. power grid is vulnerable. A widespread power outage could take years to restore. This book describes the risk and details how to prepare. Also see Radiation Survival, our second survival book.
author: Larry Poole
